item.title: Leaves acorns, 17th September
item.description:
The bmx circuit is full of leaves and acorns. It make cycling very dangerous. My son got 3 punctures in one wheel and fell over due to tree debris. Also is it possible to install cctv as there was a group of boys throwing supermarket trolley over the ramps .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Martens Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadworks billboards completely obstruct cycle/pedestrian walkway, 17th September
item.description:
The giant electric billboard and a frame roadworks signs placed on the cycle path/pedestrian walkway on approach to go under the A2 are currently positioned so that the paths for bicycles or wheelchairs are obstructed, while pedestrians have to walk around them. Please either reposition them so the crossing can be used as intended, or change the size of the billboards to more appropriate widths.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 138, Woolwich Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Fox, 17th September
item.description:
Member of public has moved a dead fox from busy road onto path. Please can this be removed asap as children travel to school along with path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 276, Burnt Oak Lane, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling bin lid ripped off and torn. Bin overflowing all over floor, 17th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Terrace, Hackney, London
